rules_text:
Whenever you draw a card, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Escape–{2}{W}{U}{B}, Exile an artifact card, a creature card, and an enchantment card from your graveyard [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)[/i]
Outcast of Sannuria escapes with “When this creature enters, draw two cards.”
